resources.string: Play gifs inside Maki without browser
Open links inside Maki without a browser
Please, reload app to apply changes
The text of each post will be centered
Secure Maki with a smart passcode
If you forget your pin, please clear Maki\'s data from your phones application manager.
Reduce data usage by removing images.
Hide Status editor in News Feed
When enabled, the status editor will be hidden on the News Feed.
Prevents default Facebook theme while page is loading. (Not recommended for Jelly Bean devices)
Save battery power and traffic usage (beta)
Tap OK to clear Maki\'s data. This will also log you out.
Clear Maki\'s data. This will also log you out.
Unlock all 58 Maki themes with Maki Pro. Click here to buy!
Unlock all 11 navigation styles with Maki Pro. Click here to buy!
Show Maki\'s Notification QuickBar to open a floating window for your favorite network.
Unfortunately Maki Lite has stopped. Please tap OK to send this report via email.
You can leave comments about this crash here:
Tap here to read more about the licences used in Maki
Maki also using FaceSlim, Toffeed, Tinfoil and SlimSocial source codes. Thank you, developers!
For downloading Maki Lite. Thank you!
Maki based on Folio by Creative Trends. Thank you so much! Don\'t forget to download Jorell\'s new amazing app - Simplicity Browser
Tap here to see whose helped translate Maki.
Unable to perform selected action because permissions were not granted.
Do you really want to quit?
Grant location permission to use this feature
Permission denied. This action cannot be completed.
Maki allows quickly and easily use the Facebook on your Android device
Use Facebook everywhere in any time
Thank you for downloading Maki Lite. Now let\'s get started!
Don\'t forget to turn on notifications in Settings!
If you forget your pin, please, clear Maki data from your phones application manager.
What do you think about Maki Lite? Rate Maki here:
Please, contact with us and tell what do you do not like in Maki. Thank you!

Upgrade to Maki Pro and unlock all 55 themes, hide ads in newsfeed, get new navigation styles, retain the last viewed pages and even more. And support development, of course! And all of it only for 1 $.

New in this version

Updates of this version:
-QuickBar for Instagram and VK;
-open links in Maki;
-Navigation Drawer for Twitter;
-preference to launch Twitter before Facebook;
-updated Maki Classic Theme;
-new style: Google+ Red;
-source code on Github;
-bug fixes and minor improvements.

Thank you for using Maki! Don\'t forget to like our page on Facebook!
